website_summaries.verdict: This is a reliable, easy-to-use compass that's great for kids or adults who are unfamiliar with navigation techniques.
pros: Comes with a small hole for connecting to a lanyard
Well balanced for use in the northern hemisphere
Comes with detailed instructions to help beginners learn how to use it
cons: Users report that the capsule is not liquid-filled as the product description states

customer_reviews.title: Excellent easy-to-use compass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy-to-use compass. Everything is clearly legible with no defects. Keep in mind this has a fixed declination scale, so if you need adjustable declination you should spend a little more to get something like the M3-G.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not Liquid Filled
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if I got a fake or not, but this compass is not liquid filled despite what the packaging or Suunto's website says. For those saying that the liquid is clear and free of bubbles, all 7 of the compasses I received do not bend a laser beam. I can't believe that the liquid does not have an index of refraction. The clear circle does not have any magnification. Otherwise It looks exactly as pictured Finally got a chance to talk to an eagle scout. He told me that mine were definitely not liquid filled. The needle bounces all over while walking. The purpose of the liquid is to minimize that. I'm sending mine back to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gatza

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 5 seconds of opening it.
customer_reviews.text: I was sitting on the ground unpacking the compass when it dropped out of my hand. Again, I was SITTING down, the drop was about 2 feet. The compass opened up and spilled liquid all over the place. What a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: keith k

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Does what a basic compass should do. Tested it on a hike today and it appeared to function properly: sent me in the right direction and got me back to my car. I don't intend to do any extravagant navigation--just wanted a basic compass that wasn't hard to figure out and would get me back on track in an emergency situation. This does that. So I'm a happy hiker.
customer_reviews.author: RestlessBoomer

customer_reviews.title: This one works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other, cheaper compasses and just proved the old adage "you get what you pay for". The cheaper ones did not work consistently thereby being useless. This Suunto seems to always point in the same direction as North giving me some confidence it is accurate. I need this compass to properly aim my portable dish for my RV satellite TV and it is critical to establish North as the first step.
customer_reviews.author: rjohn

customer_reviews.title: Good compass for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It’s exactly what advertised. It’s accurate and easy to use. No bubbles. Would be nice if it had a magnify part but I guess this would be for more expensive items... The dial does not glow which is fine as well. If you want this that glow you must get the extremely expensive ones that glow for hours and not the ones that glow for short time after exposure to light. Night navigation should not need light to make it glow since you either use a flashlight (ruin night vision) or best red light source.
customer_reviews.author: HKOR

customer_reviews.title: Fast moving needle that settles quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bezel is a little tight making it hard to rotate but I suppose too that that's a good thing as it locks in the bearing. The needle is very responsive to movement and settles immediately once you stop moving. I appreciate that Suunto provides instructions with their compass as I've discovered that not all compass makers do.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Camping backup
customer_reviews.text: I took my famuily camping and felt like responsibly i should have one of these things if we were to go hiking! I purchased this for just in case scenarios if we got turned backwards, and for teaching the kids. I felt better knowing we had it and look forward to teaching the kids how to use it to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Compass
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a compass that my kids could use easily. I researched and Wirecutter recommended this one. I am pleased with the purchase. It is good quality, decent weight and heft. It is easy to read, isn't going to rust, reads true, and I like that you can easily attach it to a string, carabiner, etc.
customer_reviews.author: chinou2

customer_reviews.title: Please don't rely on a cheap compass that comes with your keychain or knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hiking pack so I would have a dedicated compass. I my short testing period, this device is very accurate. I have more trust for in this compass than something free that comes built in to some other tool. I don't count ounces as my hikes are short, but if I get lost I wanted something trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin I Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable compass.
customer_reviews.text: I used this compass my recent trip to the Boundary Waters Canoe area. It was my "in the boat" compass. The long lanyard was attached to my life jacket, and I would set the compass on my leg and refer to it while paddling. It is easy to read at a glance, and not so expensive or fancy that I worry about banging it up or getting it in the lake. For as affordable as this thing is, there's no point in getting a cheaper Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Evans

customer_reviews.title: Spot on directions
customer_reviews.text: Tried this at my house where I already knew what was due north, south, east, and west. Out of the pkg it immediately went to the proper direction. Came with instructions to use with a map. Glad to see that as I have never used a map alongside a compass before.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzmom

customer_reviews.title: Makes land nav easy.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for land nav tests for search and rescue. It’s a solid compass, easy to read and I prefer it to a lensatic by far. The bezel is easy to read and easy to manipulate but won’t slip on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... hiking/camping and has always been true and held up great. It's no wonder that I was gravitated to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad has always had an earlier version of this compass when we went hiking/camping and has always been true and held up great. It's no wonder that I was gravitated to this product when searching for a compass of my own. I have yet to give it a solid test run, but it always seems accurate when I test the needle. Never gets caught up, very smooth action and feels solid for how light it is.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: It's been verified
customer_reviews.text: Initially i wanted to test the thickness & durability of these topographic models so i went with the entry level model & now that I've had & tested it, i can definitely say i will likely be buying the Suunto M-3 G model as it was always the one i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Accurate as expected, compared it to my other compass and it’s true north
customer_reviews.author: MGA

customer_reviews.title: where is the TV station
customer_reviews.text: got this compass to get the direction of broadcast TV stations to orient directional antennas. fast settling and stable needle, good repeatability.
customer_reviews.author: pila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, just a nice solid compass made in Finland. I am glad I went with this one instead of a cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: W. E.

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions Are Good
customer_reviews.text: Just a nice basic compass, made in Finland and not in China like 99% of the options on the market. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Msmith68W

customer_reviews.title: A great basic compass
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, inexpensive, and easy to use. We had it along on a family trip to Yellowstone and the Tetons. A good thing to have a long Justin case. My kids also loved taking turns wearing it on its lanyard and learning how to use a compass.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: good starter compass
customer_reviews.text: good for the price. suunto will not leave you stranded
customer_reviews.author: Ernie A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very good basic compass for backup to electronics (cell phone, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Detective

customer_reviews.title: Vendor either mis-identified or sent wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Thought I purchased compass for N hemisphere, compass geared toward S hemisphere arrived. Return was seamless. Compass was excellent item as advertized, just for wrong hemisphere.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barrilleaux MD

customer_reviews.title: I also have their mirror compass which is also good. This compass didn't cost as much
customer_reviews.text: The brand, Suunto, is noted for quality and ruggedness. I also have their mirror compass which is also good. This compass didn't cost as much, but still works fine with the maps and land navigation. It's in my small EDC pack. When we were out last week, I shot two back azimuths to check my (known) location. It was with in 200 yards. That's close enough since I wasn't calling in artillery. If you choose this compass, you won't be disappointed. It is easy to spend more and get all the bells and whistles, but this compass is well made and accurate enough for every day usage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: A good standard compass
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet used it in the field but it seems to be a very good standard compass. I believe it has built-in declination.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great help afield
customer_reviews.text: Same kind of compass I had as a Boy Scout. Liked the "lanyard cord" so I can carry around neck. Actually got into to some area where I needed it to get proper directions...... It really helped me...I was setting courses using degrees on the compass. Have in the past used a "wrist compass" for this function, but this one is much better....... Will be a regular "carry along" with me on future trips afield.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great starter compass
customer_reviews.text: Good compass for learning the basics of using a compass with a map.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Army

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use-my favorite type of compass. Approved by this Girl Scout!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite type of compass. Easy to teach Red Fred in the Shed! Durable, doesn’t scratch and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my mapping class in college, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent compass. Quality made in Finland. Buy this instead of the Chinese junk and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: redstapler

customer_reviews.title: Might buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: Where would I be without this compass. Is that a pun? Yes it is! Great compass!
customer_reviews.author: Matt FleenerTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go
customer_reviews.text: I needed to kn ow where north was to set up a telescope. This mid-range, mid-price Suunto does the job. Orienteers, campers and hikers, map readers and all else who need an inexpensive well made compass device will find this satisfied their needs.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Asrelsky

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice but the new one is bigger than the old model and I like the smaller one better. Also I ordered the Metric one, but its only half metric. The 1:24000 scale is in miles. I do everything in Metric and this is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Classic suunto
customer_reviews.text: Classic compass. Reliable and easy to use. Is there anything else that needs to be said?
customer_reviews.author: Enrique D

customer_reviews.title: I think it will be nice if this compass comes with its own storage piece
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this compass for all his orienteering requirement from boyscout. We bought the pocket cover separetely, the one with the belt loop. I think it will be nice if this compass comes with its own storage piece.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around compass
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy and sturdy. Has everything one needs to learn map and compass navigation. The rotating bezel is solid and the included instructions are easy to follow. Would definitely recommend this to any beginning scout or outdoors(wo)man.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and accurate compass for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and accurate compass for hiking. Very lightweight, the clear baseplate and scales makes it a breeze to use with maps.
customer_reviews.author: T. Zernicke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compact, reliable, no frills - fits the bill for my needs as a day hiker.
customer_reviews.author: RideHikeBike

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't break, get me A's in my field exams, gets me places. Good.
customer_reviews.author: M Angelica Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Stuck
customer_reviews.text: This compass quit working within a month. The needle is stuck. It was not mistreated.
customer_reviews.author: PWB

customer_reviews.title: Good compass for Boy Scouts
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy plastic base. Bezel moves around nicely for setting direction. This will get used this July at Boy Scout summer camp so we will see how it holds up to hiking and daily usage.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Good compass
customer_reviews.text: Product is durable if you take care of it. Very reliable. Easy to read. So light weight you forget you have it. Perfect for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids Loved them, what can I say
customer_reviews.text: Kids Loved them, what can I say. Thought they should have & learn a compass the way they run up & down the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks good, even though I have not used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ready, not liquid filled.
customer_reviews.text: Not liquid filled and off by 5+ degrees, is Suunto going to pay for the search & rescue when I am lost because of their compass, I doubt it. I rolled the dice and crapped out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems real nice, I would not hesitate to purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a teenager interested in navigation. Quality seems real nice, I would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Drew D

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and it survives an accidental dropping when ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and it survives an accidental dropping when I am "in the field." Fits very nicely in my shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F

customer_reviews.title: This compass does everything I bought it for and is easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Being a bowhunter, it is very important to know which stand locations you can hunt in regard to the wind direction . This compass does everything I bought it for and is easy to read. It is also a great value. I would recommend this compass.
customer_reviews.author: Paws

customer_reviews.title: Never get on the Trail Without It
customer_reviews.text: A very basic baseplate compass and that is exactly what I​ wanted. Small, lightweight and best of all accurate. Keep it in the pocket of the waist strap on my backpack while on the trail. Comes with a lanyard long enough to hang around your neck if you wanna roll like that. Sturdy little sucker too have dropped it and stepped on it once and it still points north. Stop stressing and pick this one up
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.text: My son used it this past weekend on a camping trip and it worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: JRT0829

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, smooth operation, and durable. Definitely recommend for the no-frills hiker and camper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, durable compass. The more complex "military" style compasses break very easily. This one lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, well made, accurate compass for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Hiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great compass. I love it! Very accurate and durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. What more can I say ?
customer_reviews.author: ramjet

customer_reviews.title: They came and look fine, though they haven't been taken out of packaging
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for granddaughters for a map kind of Christmas present. They came and look fine, though they haven't been taken out of packaging.
customer_reviews.author: teacherbluehills

customer_reviews.title: Suunto A-10 compass
customer_reviews.text: Great compass; easy to use/read; exactly what I needed and expected
customer_reviews.author: Dzejny

customer_reviews.title: Good compass.
customer_reviews.text: I like this compass. It is lightweight and (relatively) easy to use (for a compass.) Honestly it was purchased because I read an article stating a lot of backpacking noobs would go the wrong way down the AT during their first weeks. I did not want that to happen (obviously) so I ordered this. It points north, which fulfils my criteria. The more important person is my husband, who is boss with a compass, and claims it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Looks as pictured but barely functional
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Looks as pictured but barely functional. Capsule is not filled with liquid as marketed. The north pointer is just as likely to point south as it is to point north. With a lot of fidgeting, you can sort of make the arrow point in sort-of-the-right-direction. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: J Wang

customer_reviews.title: Simple and affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is just a simple compass that works well. It's nothing fancy, but it does what I need it to. Another nice thing about it is that it's thin and fits easily into my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This is a great beginner compass that will last a long time with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well with topo map and is light and accurate. This is a great beginner compass that will last a long time with a little care.
customer_reviews.author: David Ryals

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Product was exactly as described. Perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Shellabarger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the compass is exactly as advertised and works perfectly. It arrived on time and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: mike hoehn

customer_reviews.title: Good compass
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Working very well, very nice as a first compass for young people or adults.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: but very reliable and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Not the most accurate, but very reliable and easy to read. I use it to get a general idea of direction while surveying notes.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Product description lies on the very packaging!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging denotes a liquid filled compass. It's not. My first Suunto & my last, if they lie on the packet how can there be any trust in your safety!? Back to Silva I go.
customer_reviews.author: Scotto D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fastest and most accurate compass I have. Arrived well packaged and on time. Buy it, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: M C B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my dad, who is a fire fighter and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best baseplate compass on the market and seller had the best price and service was perfect. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: wizardman35

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value! functions as smoothly as a more expensive compass.
customer_reviews.author: TnGeorge

customer_reviews.title: product that i received from DIP 'N DIVE was a ...
customer_reviews.text: product that i received from DIP 'N DIVE was a compass that is not liquid filled. returning said compass and reordering. we'll see if it just slipped through QC or if they're just selling defective/cheap knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: nobody

customer_reviews.title: Good compass. Bought two for Boy Scout camp and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good compass. Bought two for Boy Scout camp and they both worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but was a gift, so no usage comments. I do own another Suunto, & it's 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Suunto A-10 Recreational Field Compass 2015! I am not a robot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made broken.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new compass for this years BWCAW trip. The pin that holds the needle in place came out and it was a useless compass before we started the paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Germain

customer_reviews.title: Works accurate
customer_reviews.text: Really good compass I bought when taking the Hunter Safety Course. It works like it says.
customer_reviews.author: lynnsis

product_meta.title: SUUNTO A-10 NH Metric Recreational Field Compass
product_meta.description: The baseplate Compass for hiker and scouts. The hiking and orienteering Compass. Fast, simple and accurate, these baseplate compasses are quick to learn and ideal for navigating with a map and Compass. Minimalistic and straightforward. Fast and simple to use.
feature_bullets: High grade steel needle with jewel bearing
Liquid filled capsule for stable operation
Detachable snap-lock lanyard. Easy to detach for working with the map
